attributes.action: private parking to clamp down on disabled parking not displaying their badges
attributes.additional_details: RequirePrivate car park companies and private land companies to clamp down on not displaying blue badges and issue fines and also require cameras installed and also make sure that it’s enforced as it’s making it impossible for disabled drivers to park in disabled bays that are required for currently And also make sure signs are displayed
attributes.background: RequirePrivate car park companies and private land companies to clamp down on not displaying blue badges and issue fines and also require cameras installed and also make sure that it’s enforced as it’s making it impossible for disabled drivers to park in disabled bays that are required for currently

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about enforcement of parking conditions in private car parks are a matter for individual car park operators, not the UK Government or Parliament.
